content.1: Now it came to pass after the death of Saul, when David was returned from the slaughter of the Amalekites, and David had abode two days in Ziklag;
content.2: It came even to pass on the third day, that, behold, a man came out of the camp from Saul with his clothes rent, and earth upon his head: and
content.3: And David said unto him, From whence comest thou? And he said unto him, Out of the camp of Israel am I escaped.
content.4: And David said unto him, How went the matter? I pray thee, tell me. And he answered, That the people are fled from the battle, and many of the people also are fallen and dead; and Saul and Jonathan his son are dead also.
content.5: And David said unto the young man that told him, How knowest thou that Saul and Jonathan his son be dead?
